name: Mini Miner - Demo 🔫💣🏹
description:
2D Multiplayer & Shooting Game   Current Mod : BattleRoyale

a non completed Demo of a specail 2D Multiplayer  Game with alot of mods soon (Battle royale available ) , the Battle royale concept is simple , destroy boxes  , collect weapons , kill other players ! 

[How-To-Install] 

1- Extrair launcher.zip To a  new Folder in Desktop ( Required !) 

2-Open launcher.exe and wait for updates checker! 

3-after the updating finish Click play ! 

4-anytime you want to play click launcher.exe (which you extraited in Desktop , Not the zip )

Join our  facebook group Here ! 😁

[Game Keys]

W , E - Switch Weapons 

G - Drop Weapon

Mouse - To shoot 

Follow [How-To-Install] steps  :)We'd love any feedback you'd be willing to give. It can be about anything: new feature ideas, bug reports, or maybe you just don't like how something looks or works.
